events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the product did not meet my expectations.
The case has been labelled under the refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Alex Johnson has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like a refund, and I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want the refund so we can process it promptly?
The order number is 12345678. I was disappointed because the item arrived damaged and is unusable.
We can initiate a full refund immediately or offer an exchange if you prefer. Please let us know which option is best for you.
Thank you for the quick response. I would prefer the full refund as I no longer want the product.
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
We are following up to ensure your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The refund case has been closed after confirming your satisfaction. Thank you for contacting support.
